Johnston organ neuron phasically activat.Synonym: Johnston''s organ neuron phasically activated by arista deflection
Johnston organ neuron phasically activat.Comment: May or may not be the same as 'sound activated Johnston's organ neuron' (FBbt_00100002).
Johnston organ neuron phasically activat.Definition: Johnston's organ neuron whose response is activated by small, bi-directional displacements of the antenna.
